intro: Oxydectes robusta, commonly known as the robust oxeye, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the Asteraceae family, which is characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant features showy yellow flowers with a central disk, typically blooming in spring and summer. It thrives in full sun and well-drained soils, often found in grasslands and rocky areas. Its robust growth habit makes it a hardy and attractive addition to gardens.
